title: spring_onion_transplanting
summary: Transplanting spring onion seedlings into a prepared vegetable bed.
description: This data unit documents the activity of transplanting spring onion seedlings into a newly prepared vegetable bed at MaMeeFarm. The activity reflects manual labor-based cultivation under limited resources, emphasizing adaptive use of available land and inputs without access to external capital or automated systems.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
